header.title: VME Bus Driver

chapter.p: This chapter describes the OS specific parts of OTP which relate to the VME Bus Driver.

section.title: Installation Problems
section.p: The hardware watchdog timer which is controlled by the heart port program requires the FORCEvme package, which contains the VME bus driver, to be installed. warning.p: It is recommended that these lines be added to avoid the clash described, which may make it completely impossible to boot the system.
